title: Ionising Radiation and Non-ionising Radiation
question: 哪些是 Ionising Radiation / Sinaran Mengion ?
哪些是 Non-Ionising Radiation / Sinaran Tiiidka Mengion ?
哪个的 natural characteristic / Sifat semula jadi 是 Helium nucleus / Nukleus helium ?
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 哪个的 natural characteristic / Sifat semula jadi 是 High speed electron / Elektron yang berhalaju tinggi ?
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 哪个的 natural characteristic / Sifat semula jadi 是 Electromagnetic wave / Gelombang elektromagnet?
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 哪个是 positive charge / cas positif ?
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 哪个是 negative charge / cas negatif ?
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 哪个是 neutral charge / cas neutral ?
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 谁的 Penetration power / Kuasa penembusan 最弱？
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 谁的 Penetration power / Kuasa penembusan 最强？
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 谁会 deflect to negative plate / pesong ke plat negatif ?
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 谁会 deflect to positive plate / pesong ke plat positif ?
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 哪个最轻？
A: Alpha radiation, α / Sinar alfa, α
B: Beta radiation, β / Sinar beta, β
C: Gamma ray, γ / Sinar gama, γ

question: 哪些是 Natural sources of ionising radiation / Sumber sinaran mengion semula jadi ?
E: Use of radioisotope for medical purposes / Penggunaan radioisotop untuk perubatan

question: 哪些是 Man-made sources of ionising radiation / Sumber sinaran mengion buatan manusia ?
E: Use of radioisotope for medical purposes / Penggunaan radioisotop untuk perubatan

question: The unit of background radiation dose is / Unit pengukuran dos sinaran latar belakang
